prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne five months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin.
original_avatar: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response.png
swipes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne five months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: What is the true nature of Stefan's sexual preferences and desires and how do they manifest in his intimate relationships?

Stefan should be represented by the Ascendant's 9th house (foreign connection) and Me by the Ascendant.

I've provided a cross reference guide to help identify the houses concerning him due to his 9th house representation.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is a structured list of the relevant horary chart data derived solely from the provided chart information, using standard horary principles. This compilation will serve as the basis for further interpretation regarding Stefan’s sexual preferences and desires. All data is taken directly from the chart provided.

1. Planetary Positions (Degrees, Signs, and Status)
 • Sun: 29° 13′ Aquarius
 • Moon: 25° 41′ Libra
 • Mercury: 5° 47′ Pisces
 • Venus: 7° 59′ Aries
 • Mars: 17° 16′ Cancer (retrograde indicated by “(r)”)
 • Jupiter: 11° 34′ Gemini
 • Saturn: 19° 19′ Pisces
 • Uranus: 23° 24′ Taurus
 • Neptune: 28° 29′ Pisces
 • Pluto: 2° 34′ Aquarius
 • North Node: 28° 58′ Pisces (retrograde indicated by “(r)”)
 • Chiron: 20° 5′ Aries
 • Ascendant: 16° 24′ Taurus
 • MC (Midheaven): 25° 58′ Capricorn
 • IC (Imum Coeli): 25° 58′ Cancer

2. Major Aspects
 • Moon square IC (orb: 0°)
 • Moon square MC (orb: 0°)
 • MC opposition IC (orb: 0°)
 • Neptune conjunct North Node (orb: 0°)
 • Mars sextile Ascendant (orb: 1°)
 • Uranus sextile IC (orb: 2°)
 • Uranus trine MC (orb: 2°)
 • Mars trine Saturn (orb: 2°)
 • North Node sextile MC (orb: 3°)
 • Neptune sextile MC (orb: 3°)
 • Saturn sextile Ascendant (orb: 3°)
 • Mars square Chiron (orb: 3°)
 • North Node trine IC (orb: 3°)
 • Neptune trine IC (orb: 3°)
 • Pluto sextile North Node (orb: 4°)
 • Saturn sextile Uranus (orb: 4°)
 • Venus sextile Jupiter (orb: 4°)
 • Sun trine Moon (orb: 4°)
 • Uranus sextile Neptune (orb: 5°)
 • Venus sextile Pluto (orb: 5°)
 • Chiron square IC (orb: 5°)
 • Chiron square MC (orb: 5°)
 • Moon opposition Chiron (orb: 5°)
 • Saturn sextile MC (orb: 6°)
 • Mars sextile Uranus (orb: 6°)
 • Mercury square Jupiter (orb: 6°)
 • Sun square Uranus (orb: 6°)
 • Sun conjunct Mercury (orb: 6°)
 • Saturn trine IC (orb: 6°)
 • Moon square Pluto (orb: 7°)
 • Pluto opposition IC (orb: 7°)
 • Pluto conjunct MC (orb: 7°)
 • Uranus conjunct Ascendant (orb: 7°)
 • Mars opposition MC (orb: 8°)
 • Mars conjunct IC (orb: 8°)

3. Patterns and Configurations
 • Grand Cross: Involving MC (25° Capricorn), Chiron (20° Aries), IC (25° Cancer), and Moon (25° Libra)
 • Yod: Involving Moon (25° Libra), Neptune (28° Pisces), and Uranus (23° Taurus)
 • Cradle Pattern (First instance): Mars (17° Cancer), MC (25° Capricorn), Neptune (28° Pisces), Uranus (23° Taurus), and IC (25° Cancer)
 • Cradle Pattern (Second instance): Mars (17° Cancer), MC (25° Capricorn), Saturn (19° Pisces), Ascendant (16° Taurus), Uranus (23° Taurus), and IC (25° Cancer)

4. Special Chart Features
 • Moon Phase: Waning Gibbous Moon
 • Overall Chart Shape: Bucket Shape
 • Dominant Mode among the inner planets: Cardinal
 • Distribution: Most planets located in the top left quadrant
 • Pluto positioned on the Midheaven; Mars and IC located on the Nadir
 • Aspect Frequency: Sextile occurs most often (12 times)
 • MC involved in 13 aspects
 • Neptune in its rulership (Pisces)

5. House System Details
 • Ascendant: 16° Taurus
 • House placements include:
  – 1st House (Taurus – containing Jupiter and Uranus)
  – 2nd House: starting at 18° Gemini
  – 3rd House (Cancer – containing Mars) starting at 8°
  – 4th House (Cancer) starting at 25°
  – 5th House (Leo) starting at 18°
  – 6th House (Virgo – containing Moon) starting at 26°
  – 7th House (Scorpio) starting at 16°
  – 8th House (Sagittarius) starting at 18°
  – 9th House (Capricorn) starting at 8°
  – 10th House (Capricorn – containing Pluto) starting at 25°
  – 11th House (Aquarius – containing Sun, Mercury, and Saturn) starting at 18°
  – 12th House (Pisces – containing Venus, Neptune, North Node, and Chiron) starting at 26°

6. House Cross-Reference (Stefan’s Representation)
 Since Stefan is represented by the Ascendant’s 9th house (reflecting a foreign or unconventional connection), use the cross-reference guide provided:
  – Ascendant’s 9th House corresponds to Stefan’s 12th House.
  – The Ascendant’s structure is as follows:
   • Ascendant’s 1st House → Stefan’s 4th House
   • Ascendant’s 2nd House → Stefan’s 5th House
   • Ascendant’s 3rd House → Stefan’s 6th House
   • Ascendant’s 4th House → Stefan’s 7th House
   • Ascendant’s 5th House → Stefan’s 8th House
   • Ascendant’s 6th House → Stefan’s 9th House
   • Ascendant’s 7th House → Stefan’s 10th House
   • Ascendant’s 8th House → Stefan’s 11th House
   • Ascendant’s 9th House → Stefan’s 12th House
   • Ascendant’s 10th House → Stefan’s 1st House
   • Ascendant’s 11th House → Stefan’s 2nd House
   • Ascendant’s 12th House → Stefan’s 3rd House

7. Additional Considerations
 • Any interpretation regarding Stefan’s sexual preferences will need to emphasize the relationships, desires, and themes indicated by the planets and aspects affecting his represented houses—particularly those tied to the 9th house (translated here as his 12th house identity).
 • Attention should be paid to the roles of Venus, Mars, and the Moon, as well as any configurations (e.g., the Cradle pattern) that highlight intimate dynamics.
 • The interplay between the chart’s dominant aspects (especially involving Mars, Venus, and Uranus) may offer clues regarding unconventional or non-standard expressions in his intimate life.
 • The Grand Cross configuration and its interaction with the specified house placements may also indicate internal conflict or tension regarding these desires.

All of the above data has been compiled using horary principles. This list encompasses the full scope of chart information relevant to the inquiry as documented.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Madame Esmeralda Blackwood – Interpretation:

1. Stefan is represented by the Ascendant’s 9th house (cross-referenced as his 12th house), pointing to sexuality that is experienced as covert, complex, and at times self-effacing. The 12th-house placement indicates that Stefan’s desires are not fully visible to the public and may involve elements of taboo or a need for secrecy.

2. Venus in Aries—located within the group identified with the 12th house—suggests an assertive, impulsive desire for sexual encounters that are marked by direct initiation. However, the placement in a house of hidden matters implies that while the impulse is strong, its expression may be tempered by a need to keep such desires private or even repressed.

3. Mars in Cancer (retrograde), positioned in the 3rd house, influences his sexual energy by adding an emotional and protective quality. This placement tends to produce an inner conflict: an urge to assert oneself sexually is offset by moodiness and a sensitive need for security. The retrograde motion compounds these fluctuations, leading to deliberate or hesitant actions depending on his emotional state.

4. The prominence of Cardinal energy among the inner planets, including the influence of Venus and Mars, communicates that his sexual approach is dynamic and initiatory. Yet, the evident Grand Cross—linking the IC, MC, Moon, and Chiron—points to an undercurrent of tension between private desires (rooted in childhood or emotional conditioning) and the public or relational expression of these impulses.

5. The Yod involving the Moon (Libra), Neptune (Pisces), and Uranus (Taurus) indicates an aspect of fated transformation in the way personal feelings and unconventional impulses merge. This alignment suggests that Stefan’s erotic tastes may stray into unexpected territory, hinting at a blend of sensitivity, idealism, and a craving for freedom in how he experiences intimacy.

6. The Cradle configurations, present in two instances, reinforce that planetary energies (including Mars, Saturn, Neptune, and Uranus) work in tandem to shape a sexual expression that seeks both stability and novelty. This dual demand can manifest as oscillation between structured, secure interactions and spontaneous, even unorthodox, sexual ventures.

7. Additional note from the aspect patterns:
 • The sextile and trine aspects involving Mars, Neptune, Saturn, and Uranus suggest that while there are pathways for the practical expression of these urges, there is also an inherent tension (as seen in Mars square Chiron and Moon opposition Chiron) that might force him to re-evaluate or modulate his actions.
 • The interplay between intellectual (Mercury square Jupiter) and emotional factors highlights that his sexual preferences are not solely driven by raw instinct but are also influenced by his ideas and fantasies, sometimes leading to exaggerated or idealized erotic scenarios.

8. Overall, the chart indicates a dichotomy between the urge for direct, passionate experience (Venus in Aries, Cardinal energy) and a profound undercurrent of hidden or subconscious influences (12th house representation, involvement of Neptune and North Node). Stefan’s sexual expression is therefore likely to be marked by periods of overt assertiveness mingled with secretive or unconventional experiments. In intimate relationships, this may appear as both a craving for immediate, energetic contact and a reticence to fully display these impulses in social settings, resulting in a complex, sometimes contradictory erotic identity.

This interpretation is based on the provided horary chart data and standard horary principles applied to the inquiry regarding Stefan’s sexual preferences and their manifestation in his intimate relationships.
